ABOUT US

AMDS is born out of a radical vision from radiographers who missed a truly high quality radiography service and clinical operations provider. AMDS aims to be the new benchmark for providing this.

The highest quality

We provide the highest quality possible. Putting quality and integrity first enables the healthcare provider to provide the very best customer experience and outcomes.

Experienced radiographers

Lead by a team of world-class radiographers, for radiographers. We communicate clearly and align our expectations upfront for every project as every project is unique.

Care for the patient

Excellent customer experience is something we strive for. The most rewarding outcome is for the patient to receive the care he or she needs and deserves.

Our Management

Started by radiographers with a combined 40+ years of extensive industry experience and care for the patient

Adel Sonnokrot

Commercial Director

Adel, registered diagnostic radiographer since 2001 in CT and MR, has worked many years as CQC registered manager and engineered the entire clinical setups of multiple healthcare providers across the UK&I. With his extensive background in the industry, he is a great fit for in the management team as overall responsible of AMDS' clinical setup.

Jill Mckenna

Head of Clinical Operations

Jill, a Diagnostic Radiographer with 28+ years in MRI, holds a BSc (Hons) in Diagnostic Radiography, an MSc in Medical Imaging, and a Postgraduate Certificate in Clinical Leadership. She serves as a Society of Radiographers Mentor on the Clinical Leadership program and is a policy board member and past president of the British Association of MR Radiographers. Jill achieves exceptional results through strategic planning and collaboration, particularly with the NHS.

Mark Pendleton

Managing Director

Mark is active as registered diagnostic radiographer CT and MRI since 2002. Over the years he has been in clinical management and educational roles within a variety of healthcare organizations. Mark has also supported the largest private healthcare providers to the NHS set-up and support staffing operations for a wide variety of trusts. At AMDS he ensures that our staffing operations service provided is safe, effective, caring, responsive and well led.

We what we do and we do it with agreatdealofpassion

Our Mission, Vision and Core Values

Our purpose is to improve peopleâ€™s health and well-being through high quality staffing service.

We mix high-level people competencies with a world class support structure and follow closely the latest technological capabilities, in order to reach this purpose.

We will always: Put quality and integrity first, listen carefully to the clinicians and the patients, and deliver with the greatest care

Which services do we provide

Our team has extensive experience with staffing even the most challenging locations. Whether staffing services are required at the trust, a community diagnostic center, or a remote location, we will create a solution with great quality of care

  • We staff projects from 6 months up to complete staffing takeover projects without end-date
  • We provide MRI and CT staffing service including clinical (protocol) setup, on all major OEM systems
  • We staff mobile trailers as well as relocatable buildings, next to fixed clinical locations
